QuestData.Title: You Light Up My Life
QuestData.Description:
Great power entices great hunger. The insatiable devourers scale the cliffs in search of sustenance.
Soon they will swarm the plateau. They seek to consume all they encounter. The vessel. Its power. Us.
This must not come to pass. Wield this automa. Silence their slavering howls.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Pocopoc to defend the vessel against the devourers.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the vessel to Firim at Exile's Hollow.
QuestData.RewardText: Sanctuary, for now. A greater task remains.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver Cosmic Orbs to Pocopoc to power its escape
